title: Highlights from Victoria's Murray Region captured on film
abstract: Films from 1920 to 1948 from the NFSA which look at the Murray River Region featuring paddlesteamers, shipbuilding and agricultural scenes.
description: A collection of early films relating to the Murray River region including agricultural depictions such as sultana growing which was one of Australia's primary industries. Focuses on growing through to harvesting and export of sultanas. Highlights also include related industries such as dairy farming, fruit orchards and the harvesting and processing and distribution of fruit. Footage also contains scenes along the Murray River including paddleboats and other scenic attractions.
